mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement: Where you deserve it all, just because you exist!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this-you know how I roll up to my daily champagne brunch in my private jet, right? Well, the other day, I had a total meltdown. Why? Because the butler had the audacity to serve my caviar on a silver platter instead of gold like I specifically requested! I mean, come on, do I look like a peasant to you? Anyway, after a dramatic display of disappointment, I graciously forgave him-after all, I am Hot Josh, and my demands should never be taken lightly.
